content.detailedDescription:
While standing on my apartment's balcony while smoking, i was gazing the sky randomly. at one point a flash of light attracted my attention and saw a moving "star". at first it was like a normal small star but while watching the light got very bright like the north star. this event took no longer then 5 seconds, then the light went dimmer until vanished from my line of sight.

i don't know exactly what i saw but as i know a landing light of an airplane is only used when landing and this did not have the airport trajectory. and i guess that the landing light is not week at first then increases in intensity then goes dimmer.
content.summary: Flash then like a shooting star at first, then got brighter then dimmer and slowly vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Regularly witness many bright quick flashing bright white lights that travel in groups and when in particular locations they emmitt orange glowing lights that accelerate away from me rapidly.  at times it looks like the orbs are multipting one after the other and i have seen them make a long string of these orange lights 20+ in numbers.  i have now seen these particular lights over my house and within 500 feet of me at least 75 times!!!  local news has even covered it a few times even contacting f.A.A and shaw airforce basu themselves, nothing came out of it, air force had no training exercises in our state.
content.summary: Many ufos in north myrtle beach again and again without answers

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i have seen this starlike light before.  i saw it hovering over my neighbors house in december.  it scared me then.  my daughter lives down the street from me and i told her to be careful because i am a star watcher and i have seen other things that i cannot explain. i did not see it again until that april 19, 2013 on my way to work at 6am.  i pulled out of my garage and turned onto johnnycake rd.  when i made the turn onto fairbrooks, i saw this bright starlike light.  it was really low, and i thought, oh maybe it was a drone.  it was still a little misty out and it was still a little dark, but not real dark. i made the turn onto fairbrooks and then turned onto greengage to security blvd.  that only takes about 2 minutes.  when i got to the stop light at security...The first light..I looked up above the stop light and that light was there.  i did not see it move to this position and i did not see it move in december.  however, this time it moved right over my car.  i looked up through the sun roof and all i saw was the most beautiful blue light i had ever seen.  i cannot describe the color.  only one blue light over the closest side to the passenger seat.  it made no sound, i could see no shape, nothing.  it passes my car going in a steady line heading toward the centers for medicade and medicare services (cms). the light turned green and i went forward trying to look in my rear view mirror. i looked and it was no where in sight. i have not seen it since. did anyone else see this?  there were other cars at the light, but i did not look at them.
that night i told my family.  i was shaken and they knew i was serious.  then a few day later my daughter called me and said that she saw it.  she said it looked just as i described and did not move.  she did not see underneath it.  her friend was with her and neither one of them had an explaination for what it was.
content.summary: I turned on to johnnycake  as i approached the turn onto fairbrooks,huge white and gold star like light was hovering over the trees.I got on security blvd hovering then it went right over my car-saw a blue light under no sound or solid object

content.detailedDescription:
Taking the trash to the street when i noticed a bright red light in the sky. under path for lax and thought this was a plane on right base turn to the airport. i stood to observe it and noticed that it didn't move. i kept watching and waiting for some action however, it stayed motionless. there were a few light clouds and it seemed to be shining through them. 
i didn't notice any anti-collision lights so i knew it couldn't have been a helicopter and the fact that it wasn't moving convinced me it wasn't the iss flying over head (which is the brightness i would describe it).
i went and got my binoculars and as i watched it for several seconds more, it slowly began to dim until if finally vanished.
moments later, some friends of mine several miles away called and asked if there was a supernova in the sky and described it the way i saw it also.
content.summary: Bright light hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were in my driveway talking and stargazing when i saw a very bright white light pulse twice about 1 second apart very high up in the sky, i immediately knew it was not a comet or plane or anything else familiar. i told my friend about it then we both looked in the direction of the sighting and we both saw that it pulsated again after about 15 seconds a few degrees north from the first sighting. i was surprised but i was not shocked as i am very well informed on the subject of extra-terrestrials and this is not my first sighting. it did not reappear after that sighting and there was nothing near that could've blocked the view of it, later that night, about an hour later we also saw a much smaller and much less intense blue star-like object moving very fast very high up in the sky heading south-west then disappear. also i should note that a while later a friend on facebook posted a status stating that he saw the same pulses of light at the same time and area
content.summary: Three bright pulses of light high up behind or in a cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

i'm a very keen aviation photographer. on the date, 1st of july 2007, i went out to brisbane airport to take photo's of aircraft. i spent several hours out there, say 10am till 6pm. i would usually take my camera (canon eos 350d at the time) which would have a spare battery, six 1gb cf cards. by 6pm those cards would be full.
on this day i took three lenses. canon 100-400mm, canon 70-200mm (which was used for the attached shot) and a sigma 18-200mm.

during the morning the was a bit of mist, but cleared to a nice sunny day. somewhere around 4pm a qantas 767 aircraft departed for melbourne. at this point the jet was around 400-500ft and climbing.
the object in question seems like its much further away than the aircraft.
looking at the image, the plane is climbing out over the runway (rwy 19) towards the south, i was standing at the north end of the international terminal.Looking east, towards fisherman island (an artificial island where the oil & cargo shipping terminal is).
several people i've shown this photo to are unsure as to what it really is.
personally, i was firing a whole series of photo's, usually if its a bird. the image before and after would also show this. though in this case both only show the plane.

i wasn't aware of this till i went home and reviewed all my photo's and saw that spot.
i emailed a few friends of the days photo's and included this amongst them. next morning at work all of them question what it really is...

i'm still thinking it maybe a bird out of focus, really hope its not... i just thought i'll share with you and see what your opinion maybe.

also the attached image is a full size unedited.

cheers,
norbert vari
content.summary: Possible sighting my opinion.

content.detailedDescription: Three of my children were driving home from edmond, oklahoma to chandler,oklahoma. when they neared luther,oklahoma on route 66 they saw what appeared to be a n upside down ice cream cone with blue pulsing lights around the bottom of the craft. it moved slowly and at a low altitude . it was moving east and they were able to follow it for a short distance in their car. the whole while my daughter was texting me all of the details and was very frightened. she said the craft suddenly disappeared and they continued their drive home. they had only driven a few miles when the craft reappeared above them and seemed to follow them for a few miles. they were terrified. just as suddenly as it had appeared it disappeared again. my son, who was driving, said he rolled down the car window and that the craft made no sound and appeared to hover about 100 feet above them before it disappeared. he said it did not fly away but seemed to just vanish. my daughter attempted to take video but no craft was visible upon rlay but their voices could all be heard.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like an upside down ice cream cone with pulsing blue lights around the bottom.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Got out of my car at a little after midnight. i heard a strange noise and looked around me in every direction. i then realized it was above me. i looked up (through the tree line) and saw three golden lights in a triangle formation. after i looked up, they rose directly up and out of the sight, the sound dispersed accordingly. i was very freaked out.
content.summary: Got out of car, heard a noise, looked up, saw three dots in a triangle form. went straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Fishing in dousman with 3 friends and saw reddish glowing object. went up to road, grabbed binoculars and shortly after disappeared
content.summary: Glowing, reddish orb that hovered for approx 2-3 min before slowly fading out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my friend's car. we were on sr 165 just north of sr 62 traveling  north. i had been looking out my window to the east as we were talking when 2 bright red lights appeared. i watched them for several seconds, they remained in   the same place with a bright steady glow. i told my friend to look at these lights. she stopped the car and leaned down to see them. we discussed how they weren't moving and just stayed on at a steady glow. we started to drive up the road 1/4 mile to get off the road to watch them more. i told her that one was starting to fade ( the northern one). she was looking and could not see it. i then said the other one just disappeared. she stopped the car and jumped out and looked for several minutes but we could not locate them. it was still and cloudless, we heard nothing. my window was down when i first saw them and still no noise. she was a little shaken and i kept going over what we had just seen, checked the time, and kept checking the sky. i drove back to the same location after 10 minutes and saw nothing. it was bizarre how they appeared then disappeared just as quickly. when i first noticed them, i thought they could be airplanes, but the lights never flashed and they were much brighter then a plane.
content.summary: 2 bright red lights appeared, didn't seem to be moving. watched them for approximately 2 minutes. one faded then disappeared, other vanished quickly .

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my child's camping trip in the hills above the pigeon point lighthouse.    we were on a very flat level "plain" above the pacific ocean, about 1/2 mile from the beach, a mile south of the lighthouse.   around 9 pm a couple of teen camp counselors said they saw a ufo.   i thought it was a joke, but looked in the direction they pointed.  here is what i saw. 

three lights in a roughly-triangular configuration were moving parallel to the coast, their apparent distance putting them maybe 300 yards off the beach.    their configuration was what you would see if a 3-masted sailboat were passing, with one light at the top of each mast, the middle mast lower and the front and back higher, and the front two masts a bit closer together than the back and middle.  

but this was too large to be a sailboat because, at the distance this object was, the masts would have been 500 feet high. 

this also was too fast to be a sailboat, because the lights were traveling at a speed i'd estimate, again assuming the perceived distance is correct, of about 100 mph.   it moved from due west to southwest, and then out of sight, within a period of 4-5 minutes. 

basically it was three lights moving in such perfect synchrony that they appeared to be attached to one single object.  

it was perfectly silent.  

now that i've heard about the black triangle, i think it could've been one of those, with a light at each corner.
content.summary: Triangle of lights

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
||> ~1104mst saw two aircraft creating zigzag pattern in the sky with their contrail/exhaust.  
when i was observing the crossing flight pattern i drew notice to a rod shaped/aligned light sources/orbs floating against the contrail wake from the two jets.  ||> ~1114mst 
orbs continued in aligned rod shape and drifted towards north along the contrail wake.
orbs had appearance of being ���on-top��� of clouds drifting into the distance. orbs were present on dramatic/brilliant ���blue earth��� background for a period of time and images were captured.||> ~1130mstorbs continued in aligned rod shape and drifted towards west/southwest for a period of time. orbs maintained rod shape/alignment and drifted from time to time on top section (1st 2 orbs) to the left and right of the below two orbs.  orbs quickly aligned back to rod shape anytime they drifted too far from one another.||> ~1250mst observed orbs in wnw sky from 1130mst until ~1250mst when the orbs faded into way far west distance.

i observed the orbs for a aprox 1 hour 45 minutes.  i have lived in/around military bases my entire life and accustomed to normal aviation lighting, etc..  i admit i also felt a strange feeling/presence during the time i was observing the orbs/lights...
content.summary: Saw two aircraft creating zigzag pattern in the sky with their contrail/exhaust.   when i was observing the crossing flight pattern i drew notice to a rod shaped/aligned light sources/orbs floating against the contrail wake from the two jets.

content.detailedDescription: Reading in bed about 10:30 pm, 7-1-13, in central tacoma, wa.  happened to look out the open window to the northwest and saw a very unusual moving light in the sky that flickered randomly with a flame-colored light, at first with small, close red lights trailing just behind the orange glow on either side.  the light would dim randomly, then reappear, never quite disappearing, with a flickering quality that was quite flame-like, but slower.  impossible to state size or distance, nor was any object outline observed -- just the light against a dark sky.  grabbed binoculars but they were out of focus, however saw now steady orange, four-lobed blob, no red lights, no aircraft navigation or landing lights or strobes.  went downstairs and out to the street, in time to see now faint object disappearing to the ene.  the flight path was similar to that taken by commercial jets flying into sea from california, but such aircraft have their landing lights on by the time they are passing my house, and no landing lights or any other normal navigations lights were observed.  plus, the object or whatever it was did not turn sharply towards the north and descend as it passed ne tacoma as the jets do, but continued level flight in an ene direction.  and i can hear such aircraft through a closed window-- this thing was silent with the window open. very strange.
content.summary: Unusual flickering, moving orange light in the sky over tacoma.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking from my storage building returning from starting a fire in a boiler we use to heat our potable water.  upon looking up at the stars for a minute i saw something moving.  after focusing on it i was able to see that it looked like a cluster of boxes seemingly all connected moving in unison.  i was very excited thinking i was looking at the space station.  i was only able to watch it for less than a minute when it disappeared into the tree line.  it appeared to have at least two white external lights and i could see it clearly enough to see different colors of grays on the various surfaces of the box like shapes making it look very much three dimensional. i saw at least three boxlike shapes.  all of this made me believe it was the space station.

i didn't think much about this until i was describing this to my cousin, an electrical engineer who is working on the reentry vehicle for nasa.  he is also a star watcher.  he said it would be impossible to see the kind of detail i described if i were actually looking at the space station due to its high altitude.  this convinced me to report this.

i would conclude that either this is a true ufo or it was actually the space station that somehow was enlarged due to some optical modification like the harvest moon enlarging due to refraction at the horizon.  in either case it was an incredible sight.
content.summary: Cluster of boxes that appeared to be in orbit.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 7/1/2013 at 10:35 pm pt i was driving northbound on hwy. 101 between novato, ca and petaluma, ca when i witnessed 2 enormous spacecraft on the east side of hwy. 101 hovering for 15 minutes.  the spacecraft closest to the highway (approximately 300 yards east of hwy. 101 & approximately 500 feet in the air) was outlined in white lights with rotating circular colored lights near the front of the aircraft.   they were not helicoptors or airplanes.
content.summary: I witnessed 2 enourmous spacecraft hovering just east of hwy. 101 between novato, ca & petaluma ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 11 at the time, my mother and older sister were in the garage. it was early evening and i was shooting baskets.  off in the distance, about 1/2 mile i saw a light coming at me. i was thinking after i looked again , "wow that's a low flying plane or helicopter," i heard no noise. that's when i felt it wasn't a plane or chopper. i kept looking as it slowly came over the treetops. most of the trees were maple trees, and i would say approx 75-120 ft tall around . as it got within 1,000 ft of me, it was now more or less in the open as it  glided over the backyards. i started to feel helpless and stared at it , wondering what it was. our garage had the basketball hoop on it and i was facing it as i stated earlier, shooting baskets. i then turned and to my front now faced the cherry tree we had on our property line. the cherry tree stood approximately 12-15 ft. high. the object was now clearly not man-made at all, even at eleven i realized it right away. i saw a sphere like object sort of flat on the bottom. it was a yellowish color, not glowing or anything like that, not round as it kind of flattened out on the bottom, like it was the "cockpit" and it was approximately 25-30 ft. across. i say "cockpit" as it was then about 250 ft. above and about 50 degrees i saw them. i now clearly saw 2 occupants and they were silhouetted by the "cockpit" light. the one to my right was apparently standing up, arms spread apart standing upon  the "control panel?". the other occupant was sitting down, as i could only see "it's" shoulders and head. both figures were silhouetted, but they had round looking heads, slim  bodies. the craft may of been gliding slow for this took like 10-15 minutes to observe. as it passed overhead, i remember no shape to it, i stuttered out to my sister **** come here look!. i looked back and the craft now slowly had already climbed into the sky and within the few seconds it took for me to cry out and her to come out of the garage it was gone. she said she didn't see it, but due to my excitement, knew i had just seen something. i jumped on her bicycle and rode to the school parking lot, about 1500 ft. away. i didn't see anything but stars.

i have reported this before 2x in my life, once to some online site that claimed they were reputable, the name i don't remember as it was like 30 some years ago i did that. i also had reported it to mufon about 6 years ago, never  heard nothing. i also asked for the disclosure project aka dr. greer to contact me, all i got was an auto response.

i was in the military and carried a tsci of top secret umbra with gamma access. i also had a second sighting, which was seen by myself, my sister, and my uncle and aunt. it was noted on a radio station too that night. i will submit that report as well, if anything becomes of this one.

the proverbial ball is in your court.
content.summary: A ball of light no noise came at me above the treetops. it cam within 2000ft and i saw it was carrying 2 occupants. one was standing with arms spread out , the second was sitting

content.detailedDescription:
Observe objeto brillante cerca del sol  tome la foto con la camara digital y aparecieron varias esferas  otras en forma oval blancas grises y brillantes como con luz.
se mantuvieron casi media hora 
se ve  en la foto que cambiabam de lugar se alejaban y acercaban hacia  el sol pareciera que se ocultaban en la luz potente del sol 
ya que se nos es dificil mirar hacia el-
fotografien hacia el sol fotografienlo y veran-
content.summary: Las esferas se observan cerca del sol muy brillantes

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out about 1230 pm and noticed a light coming in over the lake went back in the house and grabbed my phone thinking it might be a cool picture and took photos of it coming in hovering over the lake and then leaving i have photos
content.summary: Seen light coming in over the lake went and got my phone captured image coming in over the lake hovering and departing

content.detailedDescription:
July 9th 2006 8:30pm est

on this slightly cloudy summer night, my wife, son and myself were visiting our newly bought land near quartier dix30 in brossard, qc.

we spent a good 20 minutes walking around on our land and i took a number of pictures with my canon powershot a620 camera.

at the time we were there, there were no sounds, no stars or planes in the sky. you could only see a blue sky with high altitude cloud levels.

at 8:45pm est i took a picture of my wife and son overlooking the land where you can see the houses being built nearby. the view also provided a clear view of the sky. at the time i took the picture there was nothing in the sky.

after our visit, we left the area and headed home. it is only a number of years later that i noticed, while re-examining the pictures, that the picture i took of my wife and son was also showing 2 glowing objects in the sky that seem to be traveling together (approx 1/2 mile apart). one of these glowing objects seemed to show a small but visible trail. the object with the trail seemed to show a disc-like shape.

as i explained initially, when i took this picture there was nothing in the sky. these 2 objects only appeared on camera. when i took the picture the flash was on as well as the ir (infra-red) light to help minimize rabbit eyes. i'm not sure if this somehow contributed to the appearance of these objects but when i took the picture there was nothing in the sky that was visible to the naked eye.

today i am quite certain that these are actual ufo objects which were not meant to be seen by the naked eye.

the image submitted to mufon is the original high-res picture. it has not been modified or changed in any way. it also contains the complete exif metadata information.
content.summary: Two glowing objects in the sky that seem to be traveling together over brossard, qc

content.detailedDescription: Friend's family was at their cabin in athabasca, alberta. they saw and filmed a ufo
content.summary: Friend's family was at their cabin in athabasca, alberta. they saw and filmed a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday,july 1,2013
it was about 8 pm,spotted the multiple objects at north hollywood,
when i got out outside to smoke a cigarett,
i heard helicopter flying really low,so i look up in a sky,
and a minute later,when helicopter was gone,
i spotted a solid deep black color object flying towards the van nuys,
with no lights or anything,no sound,at first i thought it was a balloon,
but it was flying faster than a ballon does,
didnt look like a plane,or nothing,it look actually like something i'v never seen before,
im not sure what shape exactly the object had,but it looked like a black dot,so i kept watching,
then in about 3-4 minutes object stopped,
then out of the same direction the 1st object came from,there were 2 objects,flying with same speed as 1st,they were flying lined up,1 behind another,but on the pretty long distance from each other,but they were lined up like there was an invisible rope between them,or something,looked pretty straight,i'v never seen anything like that,so i kept watching,trying to figure out what it was,
2 objects reached the first object,and the 4th object looked like 3 previous objects,came out of the same direction,so when the 4th object reached all 3 of them they lined up in a form of square, and stayed like that for about 5-6 minutes,making slightly movements,then they start moving and lined up as a triangle with 2 on the bottom,one as a top,and one above,it looked like a big arrow,made of 4 black dots,they stayed like that for few more minutes,then the next thing i know,2 from the bottom n 1 from top just disappeared,and only one left,then it slowly vanished,i kept looking into the sky,and after about 2 minutes,i'v seen 3 dots on pretty long distance from the place i spotted them first,and then they started to slowly disappear untill they are gone,i didn't have any camera device with me at the time,so i don't have any picture or video proof,but i know what i'v seen today,and it were unknowing flying objects,because i have know idea what was that,and where it came from...
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: All below

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling out of the shell gas station near hillandale shopping center when my passenger observed an object flying somewhat above the buildings with erratic lights i could not see anything as i was driving she exclaimed i need to pull over to see the object i pulled over into a parking lot of a church the parking lot was empty and quite a nice size lot i the put down the top as we were in a convertible i then observed the lights blinking about the object and thought it could be a plane but as the object got closer it started to pass over the lot almost above our heads i thought it could be an ufo since it was so close to the ground and had no sound.We began to grow quiet when i started to flash my lights at the object my girlfriend was telling me not to and tried to restart the car but couldn't  but i wanted to signal the ufo and then something strange happened as it started to occur to me just how close the object actually was it turned off its light?And then began flying without running lights? now im not sure about airplanes but i do know that its illegal for boats to run without running lights so? the next thing that happened was we watched it as it dark cylindrical shape floated away
content.summary: The object we observered was coming north from hillandale shopping center when first observed

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the light show fireworks display out on our west facing balcony for canada day celebrations. off in the distance we spotted this spherical looking craft just hovering as if it was a balloon. it had twinkling lights--green, red and white. we watched it hover in the middle of the sky for about 5-10 minutes..Then, it started flying off in a descending fashion over the horizon.
content.summary: Spherical like craft hovered in the middle of the sky watching the fireworks display with colourful blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was seated in my backyard observing sky while playing with my child and at 4:15pdt, i noticed an extremely fast moving object traveling from ne to se in a straight line.  it was completely silent, no smoke trail. disappeared behind group of trees, got up off chair, ran to see it emerge from behind the trees and it was gone.  

as a former commercial pilot and 38 year aviation expert, i can not explain what the object was. i have seen meteorites, satellites and other natural and made objects move across the sky, but not at such an extreme speed, especially without a sonic boom.
content.summary: Light tan colour cigar shaped moving extremely fast without sound smoke trail

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was in the s/e sky above irvine. ca., heading n/w toward tustin, ca. it's path of travel came down at a steep angle, then flatten out and continued n/w. object came to a stop and remained motionless & hovered. i thought it was a helicopter but it made no noise. object continued to emit an extremely bright orange & red light that reflected off the surrounding overcast (not clouds)like a halo. light looked like the color of a burning match. it appeared that the entire object was illuminating not just typical on board light(s). object remained motionless until a small airplane began to cross its area, as commercial aircraft typical fly this route into john wayne airport. as the aircraft got closer to the object it immediately did a slight down turn maneuver shot up at a high rate of speed and appeared to just blink out of sight. total duration of the event was 30 to 40 seconds
content.summary: Very bright orange & red ball

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a cigarette before retiring for the night.  while sitting there this object came from behind me (n.W.) just over our apartment/house and continued on a southeast direction.  the moment i seen this object i grabbed my camera, a kodak m530 easyshare 12 mp. and took photos of this object until i could no longer capture images on the camera.  i still watched the object until i could no longer see it with my eyes.

in the first photo, i do not know what the bright object is on the right side.
content.summary: Ufo buzzed overhead while sitting on porch smoking cigarette

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting in the back yard saturday night around 7:20 pm when he pointed out something odd in the sky.  it was black and when i first saw it i thought it was just a bunch of 3 very large black balloons floating to the south of us.  it was such an odd shape that i ran to the middle of the yard to get a better look and while i couldn't discern what it was because the shape was so odd, i was going to dismiss it as a bunch of balloons based on it's movement.  but, as i stared at it i saw toward the top red and blue flashing lights - and that's when my heart stopped because it hit me i had no idea what it was i was looking at.  it was low, and nearby.  too low to be a plane, chopper, kite, etc.  there was a sound that sounded like an engine, sort of a low hum but for some reason i didn't associate it with the craft.  it didn't seem to "fit".  so as i was watching it i was trying hard to see the shape.  it was still very bright out and i could see that it was jet black with a sort of "t" shape.  the top of the "t" being some sort of wings or blades, and the "leg" of the "t' being dragged below it.  the top of the "t" looked sort of bulbus and the lights were at the top.  i really don't know how to describe it because i couldn't really make it out it was moving pretty fast, it seemed to almost float.  as it was heading south it was decending until it went out of view, not far from my home.  my husand and i were both convinced it may not have been big enough to be piloted by anything, but not small enough to be some fancy remote controlled toy.  maybe it was a drone?  it moved like a floating black icecream cone with circular wings and lights at the top with the "cone" dragging below it.  it was strange at how black it was.  i wish i knew what it was.
content.summary: Saw black oddly shaped craft with red and blue lights soar over the neighborhood in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: On june 25th 2013 sometime between 9pm to 10pm after my cousins grad reception ended we all headed out into the parking lot where we could take some pictures. about 10-15 minutes being in the parking lot people began to leave and we were getting ready to go as well. then looking up at the evening sky i noticed an object. the object was round and looked like a ball. the color of the object was grey or silver ( looked as though there was a light before it was not see able anymore) there was no sound visible to hear. i snapped 3 pictures 2 of them did not turn out properly but one did. there where about 8 witnesses to the object. the object flew straight and over head a bit fast and disappeared behind some trees. we then lost the object. take a look at the picture i snapped (has not been tampered with only cropped and zoomed for a better see). i believe this was no airplane, drone, weather balloon, or helicopter.
content.summary: Grey or silver ball ufo (june 25 2013) regina, sk

content.detailedDescription: We were doing fireworks. while looking in the sky, we saw a glowing orb going across the sky. 2 mins passed and another went by. about 4-5 went by in the course of 10 mins. i was a little shocked. i always thought there was no such thing as aliens.
content.summary: Glowing orb. unlike any aircraft i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i chose telos lake as our destination for a camping trip. it was just before season had started, and there were very few (if any) other campers/loggers around at the time. being a photographer, who was just starting to learn how to shoot low-light/night photography, i chose this area specifically because of it's remoteness and zero light pollution. just as the sun was starting to set, we set up two chairs facing the lake itself, and began taking in the gorgeous night sky, as star after star became visible. the stars were out for around 30 minutes, and we began to see and take note of the man-made satellites, which were way up high in the sky, and looked like little 'moving stars' almost, which all followed the same directional paths, not changing at all in brightness or speed. we knew what they were. after viewing maybe 10-12 of these satellites, over a period of roughly an hour, we both noticed what we thought was another satellite, but this one was a bit different. it was way lower than any of the previous satellites we had observed. it was actually as low or lower than planes were flying. we were watching it move in the same fashion as the satellites, in a straight path, with a constant speed. it was a solid, sphere/orb shape, with a white/blue tone to it, exactly like a star. just as i had said "man, that thing looks way lower than the other satellites we saw.." it was as if someone had a dimmer switch, and for a brief second, the object got brighter. really bright. it out-shined every single star in the sky, by a long shot. the moon was out of our view, but i would estimate that it shined brighter than even our lunar counterpart. just as quickly as it brightened, it faded back to it's original brightness, which was comparable to the stars in the sky. during the whole 'encounter' the object never stopped, slowed down, nothing... it continued on it's flight trajectory in a single line. (it was not a helicopter with a spotlight, for there was absolutely no sound at all. it also wasn't a shooting star- of which i have seen hundreds throughout my lifetime. it was moving much too slow to be a shooting star....) so, i turned to my sister, and reluctantly said, "ummm, did you just see that?" she says "yeah, i did..." then i replied, "good, cause for a moment i thought i was hallucinating!" but we weren't. now, here's the kicker... i have always wanted to see an "ufo"... as far back as i can remember, i've been fascinated by the thought my entire life. but- after having actually seen one with my own eyes... to my surprise, i didn't have the desire to 'tell everyone' and/or share my experience with others. i've told maybe 2-3 close friends, and posted it on this page, and that's as far as i have gone with any 'disclosure' about the incident. what's interesting to note, is that we were only 10 miles from where the famous "allagash abduction" took place, on eagle lake.  i'm still trying to find a logical explanation for what we saw, and so far, i have nothing.
content.summary: Moving 'star' on straight path- breif illumination outshined everything in sky
